forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Lows overnight in the upper 20s.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -2C.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers this evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Snow. Winds will increase during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. SE winds shifting to SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 1C. SE winds shifting to SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Temps nearly steady around 30. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High around 0C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 23F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 28F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. High -2C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow showers developing after midnight. Low 18F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High 26F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late in the day. High -3C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 17F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 27F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High -2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low 18F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low -7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 28F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High -2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 17F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 26F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High -3C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low around 15F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 27F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High -2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low 19F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low -7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
